name.en: Core communicator from Edward D. J altered from Vocal Flair 24

author: CC-By NC-SA by Edward D. Jones and OpenAAC - https://www.openboardformat.org/examples

description.en: A vocabulary set with a 6 by 6 home grid of core categories, symbol search button, up to 24 buttons per board and global grid elements within the home grid. Uses Vocal Flair 24 with changes from the original.
